snippet: A family lost in a corn maze in Danvers called 911 for help, apparently taking advantage of the police department’s motto, “We Want to Be Bothered.”
lead_paragraph: A family lost in a corn maze in Danvers called 911 for help, apparently taking advantage of the police department’s motto, “We Want to Be Bothered.”

headline.main: Massachusetts: Family Rescued From Harrowing Maze Experience
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Family Rescued From Harrowing Maze Experience
